Kosuke first throws his opponent into the air, creating a [[Water Release: Water Formation Wall|water wall]] under his feet, after which he attacks them with a [[Water Release: Water Dragon Bullet Technique|water dragon]], and finishes off with a [[Shuriken Shadow Clone Technique|huge number of shuriken]] slashing through the water column.
